actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing to the States the power to enact laws respecting the life of an unborn child from the time of conception.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Permits any State or the Congress to enact laws with respect to the life of an unborn child from the time of conception.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing to the States the power to enact laws respecting the life of an unborn child from the time of conception.
